item.title: Communication between Python and R
item.description: Communication between Python and R Data Science is one of the biggest growing industries in todayâ€™s society with Python and R being two of the most used languages. Python is more of a general purpose programming language while R is more of a statistical computing and graphing language. Although each language has their pros and cons, we can use both languages together to effectively communicate analytics and graphical statistics about any datasets.
